General.Name: CHTC Helon Co Ltd
General.Description: CHTC Helon Co., Ltd. researches and develops high-modulus and low-shrinkage dipped polyester cord fabrics and canvas products in China. The company was formerly known as Shandong Helon Co., Ltd. and changed its name to CHTC Helon Co., Ltd. in September 2013. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Weifang, China.

0.Name: Mr. Da Guang  Jiang
0.Title: GM, Sec. of the Board of Directors & Director
